group.name: connection
group.description: Define the required connection configurations to initiate communication with the SaaS provider.

group.name: oauth_v20_authorization_code
group.description: Define configurations needed for the OAuth version 2.0 authentication scheme.

connection.name: sagcloud_oauth_v20_jwt
connection.description: Connection using OAuth 2.0 JWT Bearer Token Flow

group.name: oauth_v20_jwt
group.description: Define configurations needed for the OAuth 2.0 JWT Bearer Token authentication scheme.

resource.name: getListOfObjects
resource.description: Returns a list of objects

resource.name: listAvailableRESTResources
resource.description: Lists available REST API resources

resource.name: listAvailableRESTAPIVersions
resource.description: Lists available REST API vVersions

resource.name: getListofOrganizationLimits
resource.description: Lists the organization limits

resource.name: viewRecentlyViewedRecords
resource.description: Lists recently viewed records

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The number of records to be viewed

resource.name: viewRelevantItems
resource.description: View the Relevant Items

resource.name: getDefaultSearchScopeAndOrder
resource.displayName: Get the Default Search Scope and Order
resource.description: Get the Default Search Scope and Order

resource.name: getSearchResultLayoutsForObjects
resource.description: Get Search Result Layouts for Objects

parameter.name: q
parameter.description: Comma delimited object list

resource.name: getAnImageFromARichTextAreaField
resource.displayName: Get an Image from Rich Text Area Field
resource.description: Get an Image from a Rich Text Area Field

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: Specifies the object name

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Specifies the object id

parameter.name: richTextImageFieldName
parameter.description: Specifies the rich text area field name

parameter.name: contentReferenceId
parameter.description: The reference ID that uniquely identifies an image within a rich text area field.

resource.name: getAttachmentContentFromARecord
resource.displayName: Get Attachment Content from a Record
resource.description: Get attachment content from a record

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: Specifies the object name

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Specifies the object id

resource.name: describeSObject
resource.description: Get field values for a standard object record

resource.name: create
resource.description: Creates a new record for the sObject

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: Specifies the object name

resource.name: retrieve
resource.description: Retrieve field values from an object record

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: Specifies object for which fields need to be retrieved

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Specifies the object to be retrieved

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: Specifies the object to be retrieved

resource.name: getDeleted
resource.description: Retrieves the list of individual records that have been deleted within the given timespan for the specified object

parameter.name: sObjectType
parameter.description: SObject for which deleted records needs to be retrieved

parameter.name: start
parameter.description: Starting date and time to retrieve the data

parameter.name: end
parameter.description: Ending date and time to retrieve the data

resource.name: getUpdated
resource.description: Retrieves the list of individual records that have been updated (added or changed) within the given timespan for the specified object.

parameter.name: sObjectType
parameter.description: SObject for which updated records needs to be retrieved

parameter.name: start
parameter.description: Starting date and time to retrieve the data

parameter.name: end
parameter.description: Ending date and time to retrieve the data

resource.name: query
resource.description: Create a query cursor

parameter.name: q
parameter.description: Specifies object for which fields need to be retrieved

parameter.name: select
parameter.description: Custom select field list with optional subquery

parameter.name: where
parameter.description: Where clause for query operation

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Limit parameter for query operation

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Custom filter condition. If specified overrides 'where' and 'limit' parameters

resource.name: queryAll
resource.description: Creates a query cursor, including deleted sObjects

parameter.name: q
parameter.description: Specifies object for which fields need to be retrieved

parameter.name: select
parameter.description: custom select field list with optional subquery

parameter.name: where
parameter.description: where clause for query operation

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: limit parameter for query operation

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: custom filter condition. If specified overrides 'where' and 'limit' parameters

resource.name: queryMore
resource.description: Gets the next batch of sObjects from a query

parameter.name: nextRecordId
parameter.description: Specifies object for which fields need to be retrieved

resource.name: search
resource.description: Executes the specified SOSL search

parameter.name: q
parameter.description: Specifies a SOSL statement

resource.name: deleteObject
resource.description: Deletes a sObject record

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: Specifies the sObject name

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Specifies the id of the sObject

resource.name: update
resource.description: Updates a sObject

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: Sbject for which fields need to be updated

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Id of the specified object

resource.name: upsert
resource.description: Insert or Update (Upsert) a sObject using an external id

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: SObject for which fields need to be inserted or updated

parameter.name: externalIDFieldName
parameter.description: ExternalId Field Name

parameter.name: externalIDFieldValue
parameter.description: ExtenalId Field Value

resource.name: insertUsingIdAsExternalId
resource.description: Insert a sObject where the Id field is treated as the external ID

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: SObject for which fields need to be inserted

resource.name: createMultiple
resource.description: Create multiple set of new sObjects

resource.name: updateMultiple
resource.description: Updates multiple set of new sObjects

resource.name: retrieveMultiple
resource.description: Retrieves one or more records of sObject

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: Specifies object for which fields need to be retrieved

parameter.name: ids
parameter.description: Specifies the ids to be retrieved

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: Specifies the fields to be retrieved

resource.name: deleteMultiple
resource.description: Deletes one or more records of the sObject

parameter.name: ids
parameter.description: Specifies the ids to be deleted

parameter.name: allOrNone
parameter.description: Indicates whether to roll back the entire request when an error occurs

resource.name: upsertMultiple
resource.description: Insert or Update (Upsert) multiple sObjects using an external id

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: Specifies the object name

parameter.name: externalIDFieldName
parameter.description: ExternalId Field Name

resource.name: compositeRequest
resource.description: Executes series of REST API subrequests in a single call.

resource.name: InsertBlobdata
resource.description: Inserts blob data for the records

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: Specifies the sObject name

resource.name: updateBlobData
resource.description: Updates blob data for the records

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: Specifies the sObject name

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Specifies the id of the object

resource.name: compositeBatch
resource.description: Describes a collection of subrequests to execute with the Composite Batch resource.

resource.name: sObjectTree
resource.description: Describes a collection of sObject trees to create with the sObject Tree resource.

parameter.name: sObjectName
parameter.description: Specifies object for which fields need to be created

resource.name: compositeGraph
resource.description: Extends regular composite requests by assembling a complete series of related objects and records.

listener.name: SalesforcePushTopicEvent
listener.description: Listens to incoming streaming notifications for changes to Salesforce data that match a SOQL query you define, in a secure and scalable way.

resource.name: wm.cloudstreams.listener.metadata.connection:registerExtension
resource.description: Login resource

subscriber.name: PushTopic Subscriber
subscriber.description: Listens to a single PushTopic channel

parameter.name: pushTopicName
parameter.description: PushTopic name

listener.name: SalesforcePlatformEvent
listener.description: Listens to incoming platform event notifications for changes to Salesforce data that match a SOQL query you define, in a secure and scalable way.

resource.name: wm.cloudstreams.listener.metadata.connection:registerExtension
resource.description: Login resource

parameter.name: eventName
parameter.description: Event name

listener.name: SalesforceCDCEvent
listener.description: Change Data Capture publishes change events, which represent changes to Salesforce records.

resource.name: wm.cloudstreams.listener.metadata.connection:registerExtension
resource.description: Login resource

subscriber.name: ChangeDataCaptureEventSubscriber
subscriber.description: Listens to a Change Data Capture Event

parameter.name: ChangeEvents
parameter.description: Provide ChangeEvent, ObjectNameChangeEvent or CustomObjectName__ChangeEvent

listener.name: SalesforceGenericEvent
listener.description: Use generic events to send custom notifications that are not tied to Salesforce data changes. Use generic streaming when you want to send and receive custom notifications.

resource.name: wm.cloudstreams.listener.metadata.connection:registerExtension
resource.description: Login resource

parameter.name: GenericStreamingChannel
parameter.description: Provide GenericStreamingChannel
